title: Detroit Vegan Soul
typeOfFood: Vegan, Take-out, Southern American, Soul food
description: Vegan catering and delivery turned brick and mortar restaurant, opened here Sept 2013. Specializes in vegan soul food. Small place seats 25, can accommodate reservation up to 6 persons max. Walk-in carryout orders stops 30 minutes before closing and is not available on Sunday. Park on street or in rear lot accessing from VanDyke.
